title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.10 - Record of wager; pari-mutuel tickets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.10 - Record of wager; pari-mutuel tickets

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part, all wagers placed through the
account wagering system are deemed pari-mutuel tickets and are subject to all
rules and laws governing pari-mutuel tickets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.10

Amended

New

York State Register July 26, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 30, eff. 7/26/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
